katapath pawure mathupita prushtaye rasayanika drawya aalepa kirimata pera ha pasu awasthawanhi adhoraktha wikirana kamara magin laba ganna ushnathwa darshakayan nirikshanaya ha gananaya kirimen kshudra jiwi kriyakarithwaye balapama adhyanaya karana bawath, mema kamara magin laba ganna daththa magin katapath pawure abhyantharaye kriyakariwana kshudra jiwinge janana ushnathwayada nirikshanaya kara eeta adala sudusu prathikarma yodana bawath ee mahatha wadiduratath pawasiya.
akkayi nangiyi thaththagen athi wenna guti kala thibunath ada wenakam thaththa mata eka parak wath gahala na.

ape gedara madi nokiyanna midulak thiyenawa.kolambaa rathnapura pradhana pare indan patan ganna ape midula eha paththen eka paratama puduma widihata niskalanka maha russa gas walin hewana wuna kuburakata mayim wuna apuru gamaka darshaneth denawa.para paththen patan gena eha konata midula athu gala iwara karanna payak nam oonimayi..hariyata piliwelata hora nathuwa athu gawoth eeta wada yanawa.punchi kale bayisikal padinna pittani nosoya krikat gahanna witharak newe 9 wasaredi wahana elawanna purudu wennath midule indanma karaganna purudu wenna tharan eka lokuyi.midulath ekka eke gas walata chu allapu ambaa gahe onchilla padapu pod kale indan ada eke thanaka thiyena bankuwaka wadi wela pothak kiyawana me wayasa wenakan mata loku mathaka godak genna ape midula hethu wuna..

akram ha susmitha athare me widihe kathawak pathirennata patangaththe ada eeyeka indala nam neweyi.2008 wasare indiyawe athishayinma janapriya rupawahini riyaliti wada satahanak wana ‘eek kilari, eek hasina (kridakayek ha rumathiyak) wada satahane winishwa mandalaya denna niyojanaya kala kalaye indalama madhya athare katha pathiruna.1994 wasare loka ru rajina kirula daru susmitha ekka winishwaya mandalaye katayuthu kirima wishala sathutak bawa akram kiyanawa.indiyawe prabala krikat kridakayan wana harbajan sin, dinesh karthik, irfan pathan, shrisanth ha winod kambli wani kridakayan pawa tharaga wadunu me wada satahanedi akram - susmitha denna itha samipawa asuru kala bawa hamoma dannawa.ee wadasatahana pakisthanaye rupawahini osse wikashaya weddi 37hawiridi susmitha wadi kalayak yannata kalin akramge yokar panduwata dawi yana bawa ohuge gnyathin kiyanna patan gaththa.eeth akram nam kiyanne ohuge jiwithaya puthun dedena wenuwen kapa kara athi bawayi.
idiri ayawayen pasuwa mema path kirima sidu kerenu athi bawa pawase.
badu adu kirima, rajaye regulasi adu kirima, saha jathika kompani pudgalikaranaya sandaha owun peni sitithi.

siragatha kala dinaye sita me dakwa eksath jathika pakshaye nayaka ranil wikramasinha mahathage upades ha magapenwima yatathe thaman jathyanthara kriyamarga rasaka niyaluna bawa sihipathkala hethema emagin fonseka mahatha nidahaskarana lesata wishala balapamak ellawu bawa pawasiya. 2010 juni masa 11 wanida jiniwa jagath parlimenthu sangamaye manawa himikam kamituwa wetha giya thama athulu pirisa sarath fonseka mahathata sidu kala asadharanaya gana paminili kala bawath ema paminili wibhaga kala awastha thunakadima ehi yamata thamata siduwu bawa sihipath kaleya.

mema panthiya sarasawi uyana dumriya sthanaya kittuwadi pawathwana ladi.
aththatama eya karakawenawada nadda yanna apa danne natha.
mewara nam niyangaya thibuna da madin mahe kohendo kada pan wu wahi yallak kaju wagakaruwanata sathutak gena aaweya.
kapila piris mahathage apriyel 4 wani da lipiyehi mese sandahan weyi.
